roleset.name: attach
roleset.note: GRAFT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'graft' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 22.3-2-1. (from graft.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: inverted args
example.text: ``I've ripped out a lot of Delicious'' and grafted the trees with many different shoots, says Steve Wood, a West Lebanon, N.H., grower, tramping through his 100-acre Poverty Lane Orchard on a crisp autumn day recently.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: `` I 've ripped out a lot of Delicious '' and grafted the trees with many different shoots , says Steve Wood , a West Lebanon , N.H. , grower , tramping through his 100 - acre Poverty Lane Orchard on a crisp autumn day recently .
